mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, BOARD_NUM, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_RE_REF, BOARD_RE_LEV, BOARD_RE_SEQ, BOARD_READCOUNT, BOARD_DATE from( select * from board53 order by BOARD_RE_REF DESC, BOARD_RE_SEQ ASC)) where rnum >=((#{page}-1)*10+1) and rnum <=(#{page}*10)
